job_title: SailPoint SME with strong java development experience

secondary: Sailpoint IIQ Product and security professional certifications
all: Sailpoint IIQ Product and security professional certifications

jd: Hi We are looking candidate for the below position. if you are interested, please share your resume at binod.kumar@tanishasystems.comJob Title: SailPoint with strong java development experience (15 Years of Exp)Location: Pittsburgh, PA – Hybrid ProjectCandidate should have worked on below componentsLCM ProvisioningCertification WorkflowSOD segregation of Duty.Job Description: The candidate should have at least 7 years of Exp in SailPoint only. We are looking for a developer so overall experience should be somewhere 15 years and relevant should be 10 or close. Experience in IAM implementation engagements - requirements gathering, analysis, architecting, design, development, testing, deployment, and application support (Hyper care).Experience in development / configuration of standard / custom integrations using Java, .Net programming and other major scripting languages such as Bean shell, PowerShell is mustExperience in carrying out application integrations with the IAM solutions dealing with provisioning, connector creation, single sign-on, multi-factor/ adaptive authentication etc.Good knowledge of the access management and federation concepts like SAML, WS-FED, Oauth, OpenID connect and other protocols and concepts like SCIM, access certification, RBAC, SoD, etc.Knowledge and Implementation of Web-services based utilitiesWorking knowledge of web / application servers (IIS, WebSphere, WebLogic, JBoss and Apache).Working knowledge on technologies such as LDAP/Directories, RDBMS, Microsoft Active Directory etc.Good to have knowledge or experience on LCM Provisioning, SSB/SSD tool. Good understanding of SDLC phases and Agile development processes.Excellent written and verbal communication.Sailpoint IIQ Product and security professional certifications are desired
